summary: Documentary about Miles Davis' legendary gig at the Isle of Wight Festival, August 1970. Includes full live footage and recent interviews with band mates and others. .
cast: Carlos Santana|Stanley Crouch|Miles Davis|Steve Allen|Herbie Hancock|Chick Corea|Paul Buckmaster|Jimi Hendrix|Jack Johnson|Dave Liebman|James Mtume|Pete Cosey|Bob Belden|Joni Mitchell|Gary Bartz|Dave Holland|Jack DeJohnette|Airto Moreira|Keith Jarrett|Ron Carter|Marcus Miller|Wayne Shorter|Sandra Gadelha|Gilberto Gil
title: Miles Electric: A Different Kind of Blue
